name: TheGoodNewsPodcast(byCardsAgainstHumanity)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can listen to The Good News Podcast (by Cards Against Humanity) in your Alexa Flash Briefing.

Colleen and Neil host The Good News Podcast, a show designed to make each day slightly more bearable. From the creators of Cards Against Humanity.
http://www.thegoodnewspodcast.fm/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
